article_title: Why Paid Parental Leave Won't Kill Entrepreneurs

article_metadata.author: Karsten Strauss

og.description: These are nervous times for some entrepreneurs in the United States. As founders of businesses seek, find and hold fast to benefits, incentives and loopholes that allow them to save money and maximize profit, they often too keep an eye out for any new rules, legislation or social sentiments that [...]
